docs.snippet: This was the season Major League Baseball was going to get serious about reducing fan injuries, by extending protective netting. A woman’s injury in Game 7 of the World Series proved otherwise....

headline.main: Lost in Game 7’s Dazzle, Another Fan’s Senseless Injury
